name: Tao (C-Valen)
description:
According to quantum mechanics, all particles in the universe could be connected and communicate instantaneously regardless of time and space. 

This game is a metaphor for the union of the entire universe and how the right vision can change everything. 

Bring your perception into an atmosphere of calm and synchronize with the flow of time.

- "There is no such thing as being alone, as we are all one."
